Theming

Functions for plot theming

palette_this()
Color palettes collected in plotthis.
theme_this()
A ggplot2 theme and palettes for plotthis Borrowed from the theme_this function in the SCP pipeline
theme_blank()
Blank theme
show_palettes()
Show the color palettes

Data

Built-in data for plotting or examples

enrich_example
A example of clusterProfiler enrichment result
gsea_example
A example of GSEA result from fgsea package
palette_list
A list of palettes for use in data visualization
words_excluded
Excluded words in keyword enrichment analysis and extraction
